description: Used to treat fever and mild to moderate pain.
Medication in the nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) class that is used for treating pain, fever, and inflammation.
A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to treat pain, menstrual cramps, inflammatory diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis, gout and fever.
A pain medication of the opiate family. Taken for both acute pain and chronic pain
An opioid used to treat moderate to severe pain.
An opioid medication used for treatment of moderate to severe pain.
Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It is primarily indicated as a pre-operative anti-miotic.
A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) of the oxicam class used to relieve the symptoms of painful inflammatory conditions like arthritis.
A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) commonly used as a prescription medication to reduce fever, pain, stiffness, and swelling from inflammation.
A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to treat pain.
A powerful opioid used as a pain medication and, together with other medications, for anesthesia.
A local anesthetic of the amino amide type. It is also used to treat ventricular tachycardia.
A medication used to decrease feeling in a specific area.
A group of antibiotics originally obtained from Penicillium moulds.
An antibiotic used to treat a number of bacterial infections.
A tetracycline antibiotic medication used to treat a number of bacterial infections such as pneumonia.
An oral antibiotic in the tetracyclines family of medications, used to treat a number of infections, including acne, cholera, brucellosis, plague, malaria, and syphilis.
A quinolone antibiotic useful for the treatment of a number of bacterial infections.
An antifungal medication used for a number of fungal infections.
A medication used to treat a number of parasitic worm infestations.
